CustomField.description: Capture the name of the Role/ Group that the Parent Contractor to the Case is shared with. It will be a comma separated text field that that will be used in the Case Sharing Rule to show/ hide the Cases that are In Litigation. The Case Criteria based sharing rules will use this text in combination with the CONTAINS operator to match the Account Shared with Role/Group name with the Case Shared with Role/Group
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Capture the name of the Role/ Group that the Parent Contractor to the Case is shared with.
CustomField.label: Contractor Shared With
